Swipe up from the bottom of the screen to open the app drawer.
Scroll down to open the Clock app.
Open the Clock app, displaying the current time as 18:44 and the date as Sun, Mar 30.
Click on the displayed time "18:44" to change the time.
Click the "Clock" tab at the bottom to view the current time.
Click the "Clock" button to view the current time.
Scroll down within the Clock app interface, keeping the time display visible.
Click the "Clock" button to view the current time.
Click the "Clock" icon in the bottom navigation bar to view the current time.
Click the "Clock" app icon to open the clock application.
